<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158408</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1022</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">People of the 20th Century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute des 20. Jahrhunderts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gens du 20ème siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Povos do 20o século</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente del ventesimo secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωποι του 20ού αιώνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gente del vigésimo siglo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Unit teaches the learners oral, written & reading skills through an interesting topic - Influential People of the 20th Century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">influencial people</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">20th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">writing skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral presentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit unterrichtet die Mund 
Anfänger-, geschriebenen u. Lesefähigkeiten durch ein interessantes 
Thema - einflußreiche Leute des 20. Jahrhunderts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité enseigne les qualifications 
d'étudiants oraux, écrite et de lecture par un sujet intéressant - 
personnes influentes du 20ème siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade ensina as habilidades com um tópico
interessante - povos influential dos learners orais, escrita & da 
leitura do 20o século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità insegna le abilità scritta & della
lettura con un soggetto interessante - gente influente dei 
principianti orali, del ventesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα διδάσκει τους αρχαρίους προφορικούς, 
τις γραπτές & δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης μέσω ενός ενδιαφέροντος 
θέματος - επιδρόντες άνθρωποι του 20ού αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad enseña las habilidades con un asunto
interesante - gente influyente de los principiantes orales, escrito y 
de la lectura del vigésimo siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">influencial Leute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">20. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenfähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Munddarstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">personnes influencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">20ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">povos influencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">20o século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gente influencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ventesimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità di scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presentazione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">influencial άνθρωποι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">20ός αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες σύνταξης εγγράφου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική παρουσίαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gente influencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vigésimo siglo</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentación oral</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
